name: Word Salad (Kristina)
description:
How are stories made?

If you think "they are written" - that's true, in part. But ACTUALLY they are made from lovingly cared-for wordfruits which are harvested and then used to create stories.

That's what you do in this game: raise up your wordfruits and then use them to create a story!

The first part of the game is raising and harvesting wordfruits based on your need.

The latter part is arranging those wordfruits for a story display for the county fair.

Instructions in-game.

All art, code, and music made by me!

Thanks to Matt, as always, for his extensive playtesting.
